title: 2 bath, private patio, parking and storage
posting_body: Interior courtyard unit with a private patio one block from the restaurants and shops of Fillmore street.
This open floor plan unit has 2 bedrooms and 2 newly updated bathrooms.
The primary suite has a walk in closet and private bathroom to make it a true primary suite.
Unit includes walk in storage unit and garaged parking spot in an elevator building.
Enjoy the wood burning fireplace with new tiles and updated entry tiles with the front hall closet.
The unit is set up for a flat screen TV over the fireplace and wired for surround sound.
